title: The Father's Dwelling Place

tokens.lyric: The Father's dwelling place is the fountain of our life,

lines.raw: [D]The Father's dwelling place is the fountain of our life,

tokens.lyric: Drawn to the light of eternal day, we abandon the darkness.

lines.raw: [Em]Drawn to the light of eternal day, we abandon the darkness.

tokens.lyric: May the Word of God in my heart resound

lines.raw: [A7]May the Word of God in my heart resound

tokens.lyric: So eternally, to receive His love.
We shall be His pride and delight, children of the Living God.

lines.raw: [Bm]We shall be His pride and delight, children of the Living God.

tokens.lyric: Into the world of Eden regained, Let's go marching together.

lines.raw: [G]Into the world of Eden regained, Let's go marching together.

tokens.lyric: The Father's dwelling place is the throne of new life,

lines.raw: [D]The Father's dwelling place is the throne of new life,

tokens.lyric: Now our resurrection is come, which we long awaited.

lines.raw: [Em]Now our resurrection is come, which we long awaited.

tokens.lyric: May the Word of God, in my heart resound,

lines.raw: [A7]May the Word of God, in my heart resound,

tokens.lyric: So eternally, to receive His joy.
We shall be His pride and delight, children of the Living God,

lines.raw: [Bm]We shall be His pride and delight, children of the Living God,

tokens.lyric: Into the world of Eden regained, Let's go singing together.

lines.raw: [G]Into the world of Eden regained, Let's go singing together.

tokens.lyric: The Father's dwelling place is the eternal paradise,

lines.raw: [D]The Father's dwelling place is the eternal paradise,

tokens.lyric: Where the blessing He had to reserve will be freely given.

lines.raw: [Em]Where the blessing He had to reserve will be freely given.

tokens.lyric: May the Word of God in my heart resound,

lines.raw: [A7]May the Word of God in my heart resound,

tokens.lyric: So eternally to receive His praise.
We shall be His pride and delight, children of the Living God,

lines.raw: [Bm]We shall be His pride and delight, children of the Living God,

tokens.lyric: Into the world of Eden regained, Let's go dancing together!

lines.raw: [G]Into the world of Eden regained, Let's go dancing together!
